article_title: When Will Grocery Stores Get Back to Normal?
article_description: I  too  thought the toilet paper would be back in stock by now  I got used to seeing empty shelves throughout the grocery and drugstores  but assumed that once enough people had purchased their 20 pack of toilet paper  the shelves would return to normal  Read
